title: Watch Face - Tricolor
summary: Incredible an amount of magical colors  we would call that is “faith”.
description: Features: -Artistic & fantasy wear watch face.  -Incredible an amount of magical colors- could be shown on the screen. -New stunning designed pointers.-Support both round and square watches.God said, “Let there be light,” and there was light. God saw that the light was good, and he separated the light from the darkness.God called the light “day,” and the darkness he called “night.” And there was evening, and there was morning—the first day.——Genesis 1-3About Tricolor:Red, Green, and Blue, this time we would choose the three primary colors from nature lights to show you what the origin of time could look like. Stunning design is not only one thing you could see here. From grace to mercy we would call that is “faith”. Definitely different than traditional Facer or Ticker,This is the most special Android Wear watch face unlike any one you have use before.Supported Devices: Tricolor supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.How to use Tricolor: -Install the app from Google Play.-Open the Android Wear APP of your phone and select “resync apps”in settings. -Then you could try to select it from Android wear APP , or to long-press you smart watch to choose Tricolor . Note:Please rate us positive if you like our work.Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.comSeeing more details please refer the below “Contact us”Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately.Tips:✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).2. Uninstall the watch face.3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.4. Finally install the watch face and select “resync apps”in settingsAttention:- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.More magic faces:Feel free to check out our more watch face collections: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=magic+watchfaceContact us:If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:magicwatchface@gmail.comOr join our community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809Web:http://www.magicwatchface.com/Twitter：https://twitter.com/MagicWatchfaceAnd more coming ways to find us: Instagram, Pinterest...Thank you for :We really appreciate for you downloading our app. We look forward to adding to our free & premium Magic Watchface line.
descriptionHTML:
Features:

-Artistic & fantasy wear watch face.

-Incredible an amount of magical colors- could be shown on the screen.

-New stunning designed pointers.

-Support both round and square watches.

God said, “Let there be light,” and there was light. God saw that the light was good, and he separated the light from the darkness.God called the light “day,” and the darkness he called “night.” And there was evening, and there was morning—the first day.——Genesis 1-3

About Tricolor:

Red, Green, and Blue, this time we would choose the three primary colors from nature lights to show you what the origin of time could look like. Stunning design is not only one thing you could see here. From grace to mercy we would call that is “faith”. Definitely different than traditional Facer or Ticker,This is the most special Android Wear watch face unlike any one you have use before.

Supported Devices:

Tricolor supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.


How to use Tricolor:

-Install the app from Google Play.
-Open the Android Wear APP of your phone and select “resync apps”in settings.
-Then you could try to select it from Android wear APP , or to long-press you smart watch to choose Tricolor .

Note:

Please rate us positive if you like our work.

Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.

Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.com
Seeing more details please refer the below “Contact us”

Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately.


Tips:

✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:

1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).
2. Uninstall the watch face.
3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.
4. Finally install the watch face and select “resync apps”in settings

Attention:
- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.

More magic faces:
Feel free to check out our more watch face collections:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=magic+watchface

Contact us:

Thank you for :
We really appreciate for you downloading our app. We look forward to adding to our free & premium Magic Watchface line.
comments: Any way to get out of 24 hour? I would like 12 hour option
Great concept and execution You'll check your wrist just to watch the colors stack up.
